title: Dumbest Products Apple STILL Sells
description: Can you believe Apple is still selling products from over a DECADE ago? This Tech Is Older than You Think:  iPhone 14 is a SCAM:  Why Does This Even EXIST?!  15 Devices We Can't Live Without:  I Wasted $342.40 on Target Tech:   Subscribe!
